import { Bars3Icon, XMarkIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/solid"; import { useState } from "react"; export default function Header() { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const toggleMenu = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); }; return (
